title: client decides not to get me ingame
body:
i am 100% certain that my connection did not drop.
out of the champion select into a black screen then an error. tried turning game on and off switching to multiple networks in vain 
in the end i get the end game screen with a loss of Lp and a leaver status 
(also sry shouldve posted this on an euw forum)

Really not my fault. Really not fair. Really really disappointed! 

http://imgur.com/MdFJ0Zi

> Off topic: i know i m low elo but i only started playing ranked at the end of last season! I got into silver 5 and in my team there are former gold players with low mmr that keep feeding cause they think they have to carry! so the only games i win are the games i go 20-2-x and obviously that doesn't happen every game! so i keep losing cause 70% of the time my team either wins then throws or just feeds to a point i can't recover! unlucky matchmaking ?

replies.body: Even though your connection is in tip top shape outside of League, there's still a chance that your network lost its link with our game servers if you were disconnected from the match. We should be able to troubleshoot and figure out exactly what the main issue is, but we do need to first double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

i did switch to multiple wifi networks available during the 6 mins before remake and did not log me in! also pinged riot.de in cmd and it gave a response of 60 ms! 
which means the problem is probably in the client itself

It's not very likely that the client itself would be disconnecting you, but it's good that we were able to rule out any out of place network settings. 

You had a good idea by trying to ping our servers, but even with 60ms there could still be an issue with that connection: packet loss. Packet loss happens when some of the data your network is sending gets lost before it reaches our servers. Even with packet loss problems, your ping can look like it's stable. Check out this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) really quick with some of the network logs from a game those connection issues, and take a screenshot so we can go over it.
Having the same problem on NA. No idea what happened but after champ select I just get a black screen after the game launches.
